Revise Blind Persons Tax Allowance (BPTA)
1. Raise the level of BPTA to be equal with the single person’s state pension
2. Extend the transferability of BPTA to include a nominated career of a registered blind person, if the later has no partner.
These two changes would encourage Blind Persons to seek employment opportunities, whilst recognising the increased costs involved or support a career that may be in part time employment due to their caring responsibilities to the blind persons.
Reference;
http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/incometax/blind-person-allow.htm
